Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_3D_doppler_factor

The function AIL_3D_doppler_factor returns the provider's current 3D doppler factor.

F32 AIL_3D_doppler_factor(
  HPROVIDER provider
);

In Parameters

provider
indicates the provider to query.

Returns

The providers's current global doppler factor.

Discussion

The default doppler scale is 1.0 which means no change to the calculated "real-world" doppler.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_set_3D_doppler_factor
Related Basic Types: F32, HPROVIDER
